about_the_game:
THE SITUATION

In the landscape of Land of Zympaia The New Light you'll be directly exposed to the world, without having anything in your hand or in your pocket. You decide how situations will turn out for you. You alone will take over the farm, but also the responsibility of your late father and make sure everything runs smoothly, because taking over an entire farm is no walk in the park. Your life can change completely, so it's best to take everything into account.

THIS IS HOW IT LOOKS

This is a survival farming game with an already fantastic landscape. The game offers many possibilities, e.g. crafting, fishing, inventory. The game is currently in BETA phase, but a lot of content is still being planned and will be added.

THE HISTORY

Darkness descended upon us. Sinister creatures set fire to entire cities until nothing is left but ashes. Time passed, but the darkness endured and there are few survivors left. Now you are the one who must do something about it, for otherwise we are all lost.

  • Campaign:
Your only goal is to rebuild your late father's old farm and on top of that, survive as long as you can.

  • Your adventure:
As a farmer you won't get much recognition, try everything possible to achieve your goal. Make friends with the townspeople, work hard to achieve your dream. Fight the darkness to live a peaceful life again.

  • Housing:
At the beginning of your adventure, your sister bought you a small house from the mayor that once belonged to your father. Now you can settle down there. Make your own new furniture to make your home more beautiful.

  • Customization:
In the game you can choose your gender to make your character look good, you have the possibility to change the hair color and the clothes color. Now all that's missing is the character name and you're ready to go.
